Class DataModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • tugraz.ivis.parcoord.util.importer.DataModel

  • public final class DataModel
extends java.lang.Object
    FileModel stores the information in a .CSV file (High dimensional data set)

        Header of data

      • dataSet

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object>[] dataSet
        Whole data set is stored in this Array of ArrayList. to access each dimension do dataSet[n] and to access a point do a for on all dimensions dataSet should have categories at the end

      • items

        private javafx.collections.ObservableList<Item> items
        ObservableList of all items

      • minMaxValues

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double[]> minMaxValues
        Min and Max value of every dimension. First value in Double[] is min and second is max

      • classIndex

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> classIndex

      • nrOfCatDim

        private int nrOfCatDim
        Number of different categories (for example a data set can have 2 categories and each category includes 3 clusters)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataModel

        public DataModel(java.lang.String path,
                 java.lang.String delimiter,
                 boolean normalize)
        Constructor for creating a new DataModel, e.g. new DataModel(file.getAbsolutePath(), ";", true);
        Parameters:
        path - the file path
        delimiter - e.g. ; or :
        normalize - whether normalize (0-1) or not the points
